quizContext: Test your knowledge on Business Analysis

questions.question: What is the primary goal of business analysis?

options.c: To identify business needs and find solutions

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a task typically performed by a business analyst?
What is SWOT analysis used for in business analysis?

options.b: To assess internal strengths and weaknesses, and external opportunities and threats

questions.question: Which technique is commonly used to prioritize requirements in business analysis?
What is the purpose of a business case in business analysis?

options.a: To justify the investment in a project
